org.obapanel.jedis.interruptinglocks

Class AbstractInterruptingJedisLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obapanel.jedis.interruptinglocks.AbstractInterruptingJedisLock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, IJedisLock
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InterruptingJedisJedisLockBase, InterruptingJedisJedisLockExecutor

    public abstract class AbstractInterruptingJedisLock
extends java.lang.Object
implements IJedisLock
    Abstract class base to interrupting locks It carries most of the code, and the thread generation is in the descendants

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Long getLeaseTime()
      Lease time of the lock, null if none If null, lock is locked until manually unlocked
      java.lang.String getName()
      Name of the lock.
      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit getTimeUnit()
      Timeunit of leased time, null if none
      boolean isLocked()
      Returns true if the lock is retained with this object If the time has expired, it will return false If the time has not expired or no lease time is set, it will check the lock value against redis
      void lock()
      Try to lock, sleeping while it tries Can NOT be interrupted
      void lockInterruptibly()
      Try to lock, sleeping while it tries Can be interrupted
      boolean tryLock()
      Attempts to get the lock, It will try one time and return
      boolean tryLockForAWhile(long time, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Tries to obtain lock for a time, if time is consumed and no lock obtained, the method desists and returns false This does NOT have anything to do with the lock lease time, if it has one
      void underLock(java.lang.Runnable task)
      Will execute the task between locking of this lock The steps are: obtain lock - execute task - free lock This is into a try-catch so close is mandatory, even after an exception This operation can be interrputed, and will wait to obtaint the lock This method will use and consume the lock
      <T> T underLock(java.util.function.Supplier<T> task)
      Will execute the task between locking and return the result The steps are: obtain lock - execute task - free lock - return result This is into a try-catch so close is mandatory, even after an exception This operation can be interrputed, and will wait to obtaint the lock
      void unlock()
      Attempts to unlock the lock

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        close

        public boolean tryLockForAWhile(long time,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: IJedisLock
        Tries to obtain lock for a time, if time is consumed and no lock obtained, the method desists and returns false This does NOT have anything to do with the lock lease time, if it has one

      • underLock

        public void underLock(java.lang.Runnable task)
        Description copied from interface: IJedisLock
        Will execute the task between locking of this lock The steps are: obtain lock - execute task - free lock This is into a try-catch so close is mandatory, even after an exception This operation can be interrputed, and will wait to obtaint the lock This method will use and consume the lock
        Specified by:
        underLock in interface IJedisLock
        Parameters:
        task - Task to execute

      • underLock

        public <T> T underLock(java.util.function.Supplier<T> task)
        Description copied from interface: IJedisLock
        Will execute the task between locking and return the result The steps are: obtain lock - execute task - free lock - return result This is into a try-catch so close is mandatory, even after an exception This operation can be interrputed, and will wait to obtaint the lock
        Specified by:
        underLock in interface IJedisLock
        Parameters:
        task - Task to execute with return type
